comment: I had Dr. Ma at Loyola Marymount University. He is an amazing professor! I really appreciate how helpful and patient he is during office hours. I would definitely take another one of his classes if I ever got the chance!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Well, don't say he is one of, he's definitely the best EE professor at SPSU. I'm a recent graduate, had 3 classes with him last Fall. Dr. Ma was very professional and knowledgeable in his field. On top of that, he's very honest, helpful and is really a good person for consulting. He guided and advised me for my graduate program and helped me a lot.

Dr. Ma is one of the best teachers at SPSU. He knows what he is talking about and he is ALWAYS available in his office to help students. He doesn't waste class time answering stupid questions. His classes are hard, but you will actually learn something. Watch out for trick exam questions in 3501... Sometimes he puts intentional errors in the code.

He is a really good teacher, he is available for questions and whenever you need him. He is very clear and the test are not that difficult, He makes yo take one quiz and one test more and you can drop the one with the lowest grade.
He is a good professor, but teaching is not good for him. his test not clear but his grading is fair.
